content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm glad you're interested in the apartment I have available for rent. Before we discuss the rental price, could you tell me a bit more about yourself and your needs? That will help me determine the best price for this property.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student, I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you give me some details about the apartment? 25 square meters. It's located in the center of Munich, close to the main train station and the city center. Is there a parking space included?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for sharing that information, Juan. The apartment is located in a prime location in Munich, right in the heart of the city. It's only a short walk from the main train station and some of the most popular tourist attractions in Munich.

As for the parking space, unfortunately, I cannot provide one for you. However, there are several parking options available nearby, including public parking garages and street parking. You may also want to consider using a bike or public transportation to commute to your classes and other activities.

In terms of the rental price, I would be happy to discuss that with you. Could you please provide me with a range of prices that you are comfortable with, and we can see if we can come to an agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay up to 1000 Euro per month. I am open to hearing your proposal.

TERMINATE
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I appreciate your willingness to pay up to 1000 Euro per month, Juan. However, I must inform you that I am not able to accept that price for this 25 square meter apartment.

After careful consideration, I believe that a more reasonable rental price for this apartment would be around 800 Euro per month. This price takes into account the prime location of the apartment and the fact that it is only 25 square meters in size.

I understand that this may be higher than what you were expecting, but I hope you can appreciate the value that this apartment offers. I am open to discussing any additional terms or negotiating the rental price further, if that would be helpful to you.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
